Posts.Content: Oct 30, 2006 01:24PM sueincanada wrote: i too have the shoulder pain..it is extremely sore all the time!!.and thats where the fluid buildsup is in my shoulder.i started doing the lymph drainage exercises today and some shoulder strengthenng exercises all given to me by my OT . took two pain killers and am sitting here with a hot pack on my shoulder blades. this is a daily thing.is it time and exercise we need to get past this painful condition? my surgery was dec 9 and radiation ended july 26th. you wouldnt think i would still be in this much pain. BUT I AM!
